name: Basic Biomaterials
description: Fundamental technologies and methods for developing materials that interact seamlessly with biological systems, laying the groundwork for advanced biomaterial applications.

name: Hydrogel Development
description: Creates advanced hydrogel formulations for medical and industrial applications.

name: Tissue Engineering
description: Develops techniques to grow and organize cells into functional tissues and organs using biomaterials.

name: Drug Delivery Systems
description: Designs and develops biomaterials-based systems for targeted and controlled drug delivery.
